Banner.Description: I'm a motivated software engineer passionate about exploring new technologies. I enjoy contributing to innovative projects and continuously learning while writing clean, reusable, and scalable code using Angular, Spring Boot, and modern web tools.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: Engineer in Software Engineering from TEK-UP Tunisia with strong experience in both frontend and backend development, specialized in full stack development using Angular and Spring Boot.
I've completed several internships and academic projects using technologies like Angular, Spring Boot, MySQL, MongoDB, Docker, Kubernetes, Git, and DevOps tools.
My strengths include agile teamwork, knowledge of microservice architectures, API development, and containerized deployment.
I have also developed full-featured applications for healthcare, agriculture, law firms, sports team management, and freelancing platforms, often using REST APIs and secure authentication with JWT.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full Stack Developer Intern (Engineer PFE)
Description: Developed a runtime trace visualization tool for embedded automotive ECUs (Electronic Control Units).
Implemented features in Java with Eclipse RCP, focusing on memory management and performance optimization.
Version control and collaboration using Tortoise SVN.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full Stack Developer Intern
Description: Built a fast-food ordering web platform for real-time order scheduling and pick-up.
Full stack implementation using Angular (frontend), Spring Boot (backend), MySQL (database), and containerized with Docker and Kubernetes.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend Developer Intern
Description: Developed a responsive and interactive E-learning platform using Angular and TypeScript.
Managed secure user access via JWT, and collaborated under Scrum methodology using Git.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full Stack Developer Intern (Bachelor PFE)
Description: Created a spare parts management platform with Angular (frontend) and Express.js (backend).
Stored product and order data in MySQL and versioned code with Git.

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Highlighted Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: HealthCare
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: AI-powered health platform for real-time analysis of symptoms and delivery of medical recommendations using data science techniques.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Agriculture Platform
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Microservices-based agriculture assistant platform enabling farmers to consult engineers, send feedback, and receive email notifications.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: LawFirm
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Case and client management system for law firms including secure access, user dashboards, and legal document organization.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Upwork Clone
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Freelance job board clone where users can register, create projects, and collaborate based on mutual interest.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Sports Manager
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Soccer team and match management system including player stats, stadium booking, and weather API integration.

OtherProjects.Title: More Projects
Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: Feel free to reach out if you want to collaborate or discuss new opportunities. I'll respond as soon as I can!
